requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX11
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.4GHz
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
